bioprojects.title: Mycobacterium tuberculosis PanR0601 Genome sequencing and assembly

description.title: Sample from Mycobacterium tuberculosis PanR0601

assembly_info.comments:
Bacteria available from Fedora Lanzas, Instituto Conmemorativo Gorgas de Estudios de la Salud, ICGES, Panama . Source DNA available from Fedora Lanzas, Instituto Conmemorativo Gorgas de Estudios de la Salud, ICGES, Panama.
Reference-guided assembly based on Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv.
The first and last contigs are contiguous. A single contig was split into two, in order to make dnaA the first gene in the chromosome.
Bacteria and source DNA available from Fedora Lanzas, Instituto Conmemorativo Gorgas de Estudios de la Salud, ICGES, Panama
